Name: [].id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: [].link
Description: The `link.id` the data belongs to.

Name: [].internal_identification
Description: The institution's internal identifier for the owner.

Name: [].collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: [].created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: [].display_name
Description:
The full name of the individual, as provided by the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].social_name
Description: The social name of the individual, as generally accepted by the country.

Name: [].birth_date
Description:
The individual's date of birth, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].marital_status
Description:
The individual's marital status. We return one of the following values:

  - `SINGLE`
  - `MARRIED`
  - `WIDOWED`
  - `SEPARATED`
  - `DIVORCED`
  - `CIVIL_UNION`
  - `OTHER`
Enum: SINGLE, MARRIED, WIDOWED, SEPARATED, DIVORCED, CIVIL_UNION, OTHER

Name: [].marital_status_additional_info
Description: Additional information about the individual's marital status.

Name: [].gender
Description:
The individual's gender. We return on of the following values:

  - `FEMALE`
  - `MALE`
  - `OTHER`

Name: [].companies_id
Description:
The institutions responsible for the creation and verification of the owner.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].is_local_resident
Description:
Boolean to indicate if the individual is a local resident of the country.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].document_id
Description:
Information regarding the identification document the owner provided to the bank.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].document_id.document_type
Description:
The type of document the owner provided to the institution to open the account. Common document types are:

ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· Brazil
- `CPF` (*Cadastro de Pessoas FÃ­sicas*)
- `CNPJ`(*Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas JurÃ­dicas*)

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].document_id.document_number
Description:
The document's identification number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].additional_documents
Description:
Detailed information regarding additional documents provided to prove the individuals ID.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].additional_documents[].type
Description:
The type of ID document. We return one of the following values:

  - `DRIVERS_LICENSE`
  - `PASSPORT`
  - `ID_CARD`
  - `FISCAL_ID`
  - `FOREIGNER_REGISTRATION_CARD`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`
Enum: DRIVERS_LICENSE, PASSPORT, ID_CARD, FISCAL_ID, FOREIGNER_REGISTRATION_CARD, OTHER, None

Name: [].additional_documents[].type_additional_info
Description:
Additional information regarding the document type.

> Note: For Business ID documents, this field must return a value from Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].additional_documents[].number
Description:
The ID document's number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].additional_documents[].check_digit
Description:
The check digit of the ID document.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].additional_documents[].issue_date
Description: The date the the ID document was issued, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: [].additional_documents[].expiration_date
Description: The date the the ID document expires, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: [].additional_documents[].country_of_issuance
Description:
The three-letter country code that issued the document (in ISO-3166 Alpha 3 format).

This field must be returned when the `type` is `PASSPORT`.

Name: [].additional_documents[].additional_info
Description: Additional information about the ID document.

Name: [].nationalities
Description:
Detailed information regarding the individual's nationalities.

Only required to be returned when `is_local_resident` is set to `false`.

Name: [].nationalities[].info
Description: The nationality of the individual.

Name: [].nationalities[].documents[].type
Description:
The type of ID document. We return one of the following values:

  - `DRIVERS_LICENSE`
  - `PASSPORT`
  - `ID_CARD`
  - `FISCAL_ID`
  - `FOREIGNER_REGISTRATION_CARD`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`
Enum: DRIVERS_LICENSE, PASSPORT, ID_CARD, FISCAL_ID, FOREIGNER_REGISTRATION_CARD, OTHER, None

Name: [].nationalities[].documents[].number
Description:
The ID document's number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].nationalities[].documents[].issue_date
Description: The date the the ID document was issued, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: [].nationalities[].documents[].expiration_date
Description: The date the the ID document expires, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: [].nationalities[].documents[].country_of_issuance
Description:
The three-letter country code that issued the document (in ISO-3166 Alpha 3 format).

This field must be returned when the `type` is `PASSPORT`.

Name: [].nationalities[].documents[].additional_info
Description: Additional information about the ID document.

Name: [].email
Description:
The account owner's registered email address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].emails
Description:
Additional list of emails the owner provided.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].emails[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this is the user's main email address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].emails[].email
Description:
The user's email address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].address
Description:
The account owner's registered address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses
Description:
Detailed information regarding the owner's addresses.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this is the user's main address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses[].address
Description:
The user's address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses[].additional_info
Description: Additional information regarding the user's address.

Name: [].addresses[].district_name
Description: The distrct of the address.

Name: [].addresses[].town
Description:
The user's town.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses[].town_code
Description:
The seven-digit code for the town, if applicable.

For Brazil, this is the IBGE town code.

Name: [].addresses[].state
Description: The state that the address is located in.

Name: [].addresses[].postcode
Description:
The postcode of the address.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses[].country_name
Description:
The name of the country.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].addresses[].country_code
Description: The three-letter country code (ISO-3166 Alpha 3 compliant).

Name: [].addresses[].latitude
Description: The geographic latitude coordinate.

Name: [].addresses[].longitude
Description: The geographic longitude coordinate.

Name: [].phone_number
Description:
The account owner's registered phone number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].phone_numbers
Description:
Detailed information regarding the owner's phone numbers.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].phone_numbers[].is_main
Description:
Boolean to indicate if this is the user's main phone number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].phone_numbers[].type
Description:
The type of phone number. We return one of the following values:

  - `LANDLINE`
  - `MOBILE`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`

Name: [].phone_numbers[].additional_info
Description: Additional information about the phone number.
Example: This is their work mobile number.

Name: [].phone_numbers[].number
Description:
The phone number (not including the country, area, or extension codes).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].phone_numbers[].country_code
Description: The country dialling code. For example: `351` (no `+`).

Name: [].phone_numbers[].area_code
Description: The area dialling code.

Name: [].phone_numbers[].extension
Description: The extension code.

Name: [].filiations
Description:
Information regarding any familial relationships of the individual.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].filiations[].type
Description:
The familial relationship. We return one of the following values:

  - `MOTHER`
  - `FATHER`
  - `null`

Name: [].filiations[].civil_name
Description:
The person's full name.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].filiations[].social_name
Description: The person's social name.

Name: [].financial_profile
Description: Information regarding the financial profile of the individual.

Name: [].financial_profile.company_id
Description: The identifier of the company where the individual is employed.

Name: [].financial_profile.occuptation_code
Description:
The area of employment of the individual. We return one of the following values:

  - `BRAZIL_PUBLIC_OFFICE`
  - `BRAZIL_OCCUPATION_CODE`
  - `OTHER`
  - `null`

Name: [].financial_profile.occupation_description
Description: Information regarding the individual's occupation.

Name: [].financial_profile.informed_income
Description:
Information regarding the individual's reported income.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].financial_profile.informed_income.frequency
Description:
Indicates how often the individual receives their salary. We return one of the following values:

  - `DAILY`
  - `WEEKLY`
  - `FORTNIGHTLY`
  - `MONTHLY`
  - `BIMONTHLY`
  - `QUARTERLY`
  - `BIANNUALLY`
  - `ANNUALLY`
  - `OTHERS`
Enum: DAILY, WEEKLY, FORTNIGHTLY, MONTHLY, BIMONTHLY, QUARTERLY, BIANNUALLY, ANNUALLY, OTHERS

Name: [].financial_profile.informed_income.amount
Description:
The reported income that the individual receives.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].financial_profile.informed_income.currency
Description:
The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].financial_profile.informed_income.date
Description:
Date when the individual last received their salary.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].financial_profile.patrimony
Description: Information regarding the individual's reported assets (if available).

Name: [].financial_profile.patrimony.amount
Description:
The reported assets of the individual.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network when the `patrimony` object is available.

Name: [].financial_profile.patrimony.currency
Description:
The three-letter currency code (ISO-4217).

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network when the `patrimony` object is available.

Name: [].financial_profile.patrimony.year
Description:
The year that the reported assets applied. 

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network when the `patrimony` object is available.

Name: [].financial_relation
Description: Details regarding any additional relationship the individual has with the institution (for example, other accounts or products they have with the institution).

Name: [].financial_relation.start_date
Description:
The ISO-8601 timestamp when the financial relationship between the individual and the institution started.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].financial_relation.product_services
Description:
A list of products that the individual has with the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network.

Name: [].financial_relation.product_services_additional_info
Description: Additional information regarding the products that the individual has.

Name: [].financial_relation.procurators
Description: Information regarding any individuals or companies that can act on behalf of the owner.

Name: [].financial_relation.procurators[].type
Description:
The type of representative that can access and make changes to the account. We return one of the following values:

  - `LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE`
  - `ATTORNEY`
  - `null`

Name: [].financial_relation.procurators[].civil_name
Description:
The representatives's full name.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `procurators` field is available.

Name: [].financial_relation.procurators[].social_name
Description: The person's social name.

Name: [].financial_relation.procurators[].document_number
Description:
The document number of the representative.

**Note**: For individuals, this is Brazil's CPF number. For businesses, this is Brazil's CNPJ number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `procurators` field is available.

Name: [].financial_relation.products
Description: Details regarding any additional products that the individual has with the institution.

Name: [].financial_relation.products[].type
Description:
The additional products the individual has at the institution. We return one of the following values:

  - `SAVINGS_ACCOUNT`
  - `CHECKING_ACCOUNT`
  - `null`

Name: [].financial_relation.products[].subtype
Description:
The subtype of the product that the individual has at the institution.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.

Name: [].financial_relation.products[].agency
Description: The branch code where the product was opened.

Name: [].financial_relation.products[].clearing_code
Description:
The banking clearing code for the product.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.

Name: [].financial_relation.products[].number
Description:
The account number of the product.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `procurators` field is available.

Name: [].financial_relation.products[].check_digit
Description:
The check digit of the product's number.

> **Non-nullable:** A value must be returned by Brazil's open finance network if the `products` field is available.

Name: [].financial_relation.salary_portability_requests
Description:
Details regarding any salary portability requests that the individual has made with the institution.

A salary portability is a request to transfer the individual's salary from their employer's 'payroll' bank account to another bank account.

> ðŸ“˜ 
>
> Please note that the receiving bank account cannot terminate a salary portability (or be informed that it has been termnated). Only the employer's payroll bank is able to provide this information. As such, the portabilities listed here may not be up-to-date.

Name: [].financial_relation.salary_portability_requests[].employer_name
Description: The name of the employer.

Name: [].financial_relation.salary_portability_requests[].employer_id_number
Description: The CPF or CNPJ of the employer.

Name: [].financial_relation.salary_portability_requests[].employer_bank_id_number
Description: The CNPJ of the employer's bank.

Name: [].financial_relation.salary_portability_requests[].employer_bank_code
Description: The bank ISPB (*Identificador de Sistema de Pagamentos Brasileiro*s) code of the employer's bank.

Name: [].financial_relation.salary_portability_requests[].portability_approval_date
Description: The date the portability request was approved, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

Name: [].financial_relation.payroll_accounts
Description:
Details regarding any payroll bank accounts that are associated with the individual. That is, each time the indivudal has a new employer that they receive a salary from, it should be listed here.

> ðŸ“˜
>
> Past employers may not close the payroll account for the indiviual. As such, the payroll accounts listed here may not be up-to-date.

Name: [].financial_relation.payroll_accounts[].employer_name
Description: The name of the employer.

Name: [].financial_relation.payroll_accounts[].employer_id_number
Description: The CPF or CNPJ of the employer.

Name: [].financial_relation.payroll_accounts[].employer_bank_id_number
Description: The CNPJ of the employer's bank.

Name: [].financial_relation.payroll_accounts[].employer_bank_code
Description: The bank ISPB (*Identificador de Sistema de Pagamentos Brasileiro*s) code of the employer's bank.

Name: [].financial_relation.payroll_accounts[].account_opening_date
Description: The date that the salary bank account was opened, in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.
